@prb12
Thanks in advance;
I did resolve the problem by passing absolute path of zero_out.so to tf.load_library()
I am not sure if it is the same problem wrt the LD_LIBRARY_PATH but if so I hope there will be a solution to solve it cuz it is a pain to write such length path in it.
Or I am so sorry that If your solution helps, I didnt quite get it when and how to set LD_LIBRARY_PATH for my self-defined library.
